channel.title: Xiaomi Pad 6 MIUI Updates Tracker by XiaomiFirmwareUpdater
channel.description: Your best website to track MIUI ROM releases!

image.title: Xiaomi Pad 6 MIUI Updates Tracker by XiaomiFirmwareUpdater

item.title: MIUI 23.5.6 Fastboot update for Xiaomi Pad 6 China
item.description:
New Public Beta Fastboot update available!

Device: Xiaomi Pad 6 China

Codename: pipa

Version: 23.5.6 | 14.0

Size: 4.9 GB

MD5: None

Changelog:
Android 14 Beta.

Download: Here

item.title: MIUI OS1.0.10.0.UMZCNXM Fastboot update for Xiaomi Pad 6 China
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Xiaomi Pad 6 China

Codename: pipa

Version: OS1.0.10.0.UMZCNXM | 14.0

Size: 5.8 GB

MD5: c25e4d8e0d20ad3663f7d5d03953649c

Changelog:
[System]
Updated the security patch to September 2024. Increased system security.
[Floating windows]
Fix: Video apps weren't displayed correctly when switching screen orientation
Fix: The size of pinned floating windows for some games was incorrect
[Home screen]
Fix: Empty spots appeared in Second space Home screen layout in some cases
[Status bar, Notification shade]
Fix: Text and notifications were displayed incorrectly for some languages under specific conditions

Download: Here
